page.title: 16MRS MILLIGANS DAY-AUCHINLECK
page.content: Rise at 5.50 a.m.to start my work,at 6.30, as a cleaner at Auchinleck Academy.I work till 8 a.m. then return home to get the children ready for school. When they leave I do my housework and washing. At 10 a.m. I have a break and read the newspaper. I continue with housework and hang washing outside,weather permitting. At 12.30 I make lunch; perhaps boiled eggs or beans on toast for the children. After lunch I visit my mother then go shopping.Return home to get children coming in from school.Back to work at 4p.m.till 6p.m.then home to cook dinner;home made soup,mince with some new Ayrshire potatoes. After clearing up I watch T.V. or sometimes go to bingo.At around 11p.m. I go to bed.
